## Marker.setCurNode() method

Set the location of the marker and call the update method.

**Signature:**

```typescript
setCurNode(newNode: IFocusableNode | null): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  newNode | [IFocusableNode](./blockly.ifocusablenode_interface.md) \| null | The new location of the marker, or null to remove it. |

**Returns:**

void
